idea-plugin.name: Orbital Frames
idea-plugin.description:
A collection of themes inspired by Orbital Frames - Featuring Jehuty, Anubis, and Nephtis in dark variants.
These themes bring the aesthetic of mecha and space exploration to your IDE with carefully crafted color schemes.
Themes included: • Anubis Dark - Warm orange and red tones • Jehuty Dark - Cool cyan and blue tones • Nephtis Dark - Golden and purple tones
